name: will
marvin's will
will.desc: The will left to you by your great-grandfather Marvin.

name: lion hook
lion
lion_hook.desc: A coat hook with a lion's head decorating the top
lion_hook.pull: As you pull the lion hook, you hear a popping sound from behind the chest before the hook snaps back into place

name: tiger hook
tiger
tiger_hook.desc: A coat hook with a tiger's head decorating the top
tiger_hook.pull: As you attempt to pull the tiger hook, it just barely tilts downward before snapping back into place

name: bear hook
bear
bear_hook.desc: A coat hook with a bear's head decorating the top
bear_hook.pull: As you attempt to pull the bear hook, it just barely tilts downward before snapping back into place

name: foyer chest
chest
old chest
large chest
large old chest
locked_foyer_chest.desc: A large, old chest with no handle to open it
locked_foyer_chest.pry: You try to pry open the locked chest with the crowbar, but it's too heavy for you to lift even with the crowbar

name: foyer chest
chest
old chest
large chest
large old chest
unlocked_foyer_chest.desc: A large old chest that has popped open
unlocked_foyer_chest.open: You gently lift the popped top of the old foyer chest revealing an empty inside aside from an worn recipe book sitting at the empty bottom.

name: foyer chest
chest
old chest
large chest
large old chest
empty_unlocked_foyer_chest.desc: A large old chest that has popped open
empty_unlocked_foyer_chest.open: You gently lift the popped top of the old foyer chest revealing an empty inside with dust outlining where the recipe book once sat

name: recipe book
cookbook
worn cookbook
worn recipe book
recipe
recipe_book.desc: A worn recipe book covered with splashes of sauces & grease covering it from use throughout the years

shag rug
shag carpet
soft shag rug
soft rug
brown rug
brown shag rug
brown carpet
shag_rug.desc: A soft shag rug in a dingy shade of brown
shag_rug.pull: Pulling back the rug reveals a memo from Harvey Hawkins

name: rug
shag rug
shag carpet
soft shag rug
soft rug
brown rug
brown shag rug
brown carpet
empty_shag_rug.desc: A soft shag rug in a dingy shade of brown
empty_shag_rug.pull: Pulling back the rug reveals nothing but a dusty floor

portrait
covered frame

portrait
uncovered frame
uncovered painting
painting
frame
uncovered_portrait.desc: A black and white portrait of a young bride and groom with the nameplate reading 'Julie & John '32' surrounded by a golden frame

lion
lion statue
large lion statue
gold statue
gold lion

covered_lion_statue.desc: A large statue coated in a gold finish covered by a thin white sheet

lion
lion statue
large lion statue

uncovered_lion_statue.desc: A large lion statue coated in a gold finish

name: nailed boards
boards
nails
nailed_boards.desc: Boards covering an exit from the living room - perhaps you can find something to remove them
nailed_boards.pry:
You maneuver the crow bar underneath each of the nailed boards popping them off one at a time.
Finally, you clear the mysterious red door.

name: harvey
house manager
kind old man
old man
cook
chef
manager
house_manager.desc: A kind-looking old man and Marvin's house manager, Harvey

name: oven
stove
oven.desc: An oven with vegetables sauteing on the stove top and baked goods heating inside
oven.open:
You lift the heavy oven door open filling the room with a heavenly aroma. 
'Chicken Pot Pie - Marvin's favorite,' Harvey states while smiling. 'Now please close the door before you cool the oven!' 
You nod and close the door to the oven.

name: fridge
refrigerator
fridge.desc: A fridge covered with family photos - you specifically notice 3 photos, though: a family photo, wedding photo, and mountain photo
fridge.open:
You open the fridge to see a small bag of vegetables with a 'Do Not Take' post-it on the front.
'Ah - I see you've found my haul from the farmers' market,' Harvey calls. 'Please leave those in there. I'm finishing up a meal for our remaining staff.' 
You nod and close the door to the fridge.

name: family photo
family picture
family pic
family_photo.desc: A black and white family photo of two adults and two children in front of a large apple tree

name: wedding photo
wedding picture
wedding pic
wedding_photo.desc: A black and white photo of a young Marvin and his bride in front of a small white chapel

name: mountain photo
mountain picture
mountain pic
mountain landscape photo
mountain landscape picture
mountain landscape pic
cabin photo
cabin picture
cabin pic
mountain_photo.desc: A photo of a mountain landscape with an older woman sitting on the steps of a cabin in the foreground

name: koi pond
pond
koi
koi fish
kois
koi fishes
fish
fishes
koi_pond.desc: 6 koi fish swim in a large pond while water drops from the loud waterfall

lock
combo
combination
combination lock
combo_lock.desc: A combo lock hooked to the wooden door
combo_lock.unlock: The combo lock pops open and you remove it from the wooden door, unlocking the Utility Closet

to-do list
todo list
to do list
todo_list.desc: A to-do list of items to plant with check marks next to each of them

red screwdriver
red handled screwdriver
red handle screwdriver
screwdriver.desc: A screwdriver with a red handle

gloves

green gardening gloves
gloves.desc: A pair of green gardening gloves

gardening book
gardening_book.desc: An old gardening book that appear to be falling apart

empty_gardening_book.desc: An old gardening book that appear to be falling apart

name: letter
family letter
Martin letter
letter Martin
letter from Martin
family_letter.desc: A letter with details about your family history from Martin

name: piano
grand piano
piano.desc: A grand piano with polished mahogany finish. A piano bench is stowed under the keyboard

name: piano bench
piano_bench.desc: A deluxe black cushioned bench meant to be used to play piano. There is a button on one side slightly below the cushion.

name: chandelier
chandelier.desc: A grandiose crystal chandelier hanging off a chain connected to the ceiling. It brightly illuminates the entire room

name: film reel
film
film_reel.desc: A film rolled on a reel that goes on a projector

name: master_bedroom_key
master_bedroom_key.desc: A dark red key with a lion's head engraved on the key handle

name: vase
covered vase
lion vase
white vase
covered_vase.desc: A large vase (or what appears to be one) underneath a blue sheet

name: vase
uncovered vase
lion vase
white vase
uncovered_vase.desc:
A large, heavy, white porcelain vase. The sides of the vase have lion motifs etched into it. The thing looked like an antique from a museum.
A note is taped to the vase handle that says "Don\'t break me ;)"

name: piano bench doodle
doodle
doodle of piano bench
piano_bench_doodle.desc: A small piece of paper with a doodle drawing of a piano bench

name: cue stick
cue_stick.desc: A cue stick that's used to play billiards or pool

name: pool table
billiards table
pool_table.desc: A large billiards table, complete with red felt top under a hanging light. The table is bare except for one cue stick placed in the middle

name: projector
film projector
movie projector
projector.desc: A film projector with two spools and lens pointed at the giant projection screen.

name: ladder
ladder.desc: A bookshelf ladder that is tall enough to reach the ceiling and top shelf. A closer look shows that in can be unfolded into four legs to stand on its own.

name: master bed
master_bed.desc: A king sized bed fitted with silken sheets. It looks extremely comfortable.

name: nightstand
nightstand.desc: An elegant oak nightstand sits besides the bed. There appears to be a book on top.

name: 'The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe'
book
narnia_book.desc: The first of the 'Chronicles of Narnia' series. A bookmark sits on page 95.

name: pc
computer
video game
pc.desc: A video game appears to be running in the background.

name: 1950 wine
wine_1950.desc: Wine from the year 1950. There appears to be something inside?

name: master chest
master_chest.desc: A lion engraved grandiose chest. It looks like a large key is required.
master_chest.unlock:
You unlock the chest with the master key.
Inside, you find a note left by your great-grandfather. A type of manifesto?

name: manifesto
marvin manifesto
marvin_manifesto.desc: Marvin's last words to the player.
